Sentencas: Fe-based double perovskites exhibit significant potential as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) owing to their affordability, moderate thermal expansion, and impressive stability.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, their practical utility has been constrained by their comparatively lower oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) catalytic activity.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, for the first time, lithium (Li) was employed as a dopant to improve the ORR activity of the Fe-based double perovskite PrBaFe2O5+delta (PBFO).
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicated that the ratios of Fe3+/Fe2+ and O-ads/O-lat were effectively tuned by incorporating Li at Ba-sites of PBFO.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Consequently, the adsorption and dissociation of oxygen, along with the charge transfer processes were regulated significantly, resulting in an increase in ORR kinetics and improved CO2 resistance.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, PrBa0.9Li0.1Fe2O5+delta (PBLFO) demonstrated an R-p of 0.072 Omega cm(2), which was decreased by 43.3% compared to PBFO.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simultaneously, the maximum power density of PBLFO-based full cell was improved by 23.3%, reaching 670 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These findings suggest that Li-doping holds great potential for improving the performance of Fe-based SOFC cathodes, thereby contributing to the advancement of clean and sustainable energy technologies.
Titulo: Lithium doping enhanced ORR kinetics and CO2 tolerance of iron-based double perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells
